text: The surplus, above the share of the surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner, or the whole surplus, when there is no surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner, descends and is distributed as provided by this chapter and by section 19-701.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 19-305.

1973 Ed., § 19-305.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 16-79, in the section heading, substituted "surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner" for "surviving spouse"; and substituted "surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner" for "surviving spouse" throughout section.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-79, see notes following § 19-101.02.

DC CODE § 19-305

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Distribution of surplus after payment to surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner.
